condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Financial and Operational Sustainability | Description :PA Schedule Section IV. Provision requiring Guilin tocause GWSC and GSC to generate total revenues (operating revenues plus net non-operating income) equivalent to not less than itstotal operating expenses, excluding depreciation, and provide an annual review of how this requirement will be met by October 31 ofeach year (starting in 2015). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :PA Schedule Section I.A.1. Provision requiring Guilin to maintain theProject Leading Group, the Project Management Office and the Environmental Automatic Monitoring Management Office.
Finance Agreement :Project Management Manual | Description :PA Schedule Section I.A.4. Provision requiring the Project to becarried out in accordance with the Project Management Manual.
Finance Agreement :Safeguards | Description :PA Schedule Section I.C. Provision requiring the Project to be carried out inaccordance with the Safeguards Instruments.

Finance Agreement :Sludge Management Center | Description :PA Schedule Section I.C.5. Guilin to (a) carry out a least cost analysisfor sludge management and afford the Bank to exchange view and make recommendation on said analysis;(b) select the site for theconstruction of the sludge management center, in accordance with the criteria and the process set forth in the ESMF;(c) proceed tohave the EMP updated in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date :31-Dec-2015

title.narrative: Increase in capacity of Chengbei WTP per day
No. of WWTPs upgraded to meet the improved effluent discharge standard (Class IA of GB18918-2002)
Build & operation of a cloud-based drinking water operation platform for smarter water service management in Guilin
Amount of sludge treated and disposed safely per day (water content 72%)
No. of sludge treatment facilities upgraded in WWTPs
Number of people in urban areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project
Number of beneficiaries of the improved wastewater collection and treatment services under the project
Volume(mass) of BOD pollution load removed by treatment plant under the project
Client days of local training and local study tours (based on study/training/trip reports)
